attributes.action: Hold a national vote to select the new leader of the Tory party
attributes.background:
Boris Johnson will be put in post as prime minister due to circumstance rather than democratic process.
The UK should hold a vote on order to vote for the prime minister in a democratic way.

rejection.details:
This would be a decision for the Conservative Party and not the UK Government or Parliament.

You might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/262709
